name: Kota Vivek
college: SREENIDHI INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

education.school: SREENIDHI INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

projects.name: BLOGGER'S POST
projects.description: Developed a full-stack blogging platform using Express.js, RESTful APIs, EJS, and Bootstrap. Implemented CRUD operations for managing blog posts and ensured dynamic content rendering with EJS. Created a responsive, user-friendly interface with Bootstrap, enhancing the user experience across devices.

projects.name: IPL SCORE PREDICTION
projects.description: Implemented a machine learning model to predict the scores of Indian Premier League (IPL) cricket matches based on historical match data. Utilized regression algorithms and feature engineering techniques to analyze factors such as team performance, batting order, pitch conditions, and player statistics.

projects.name: STRENGTHENING ATM SECURITY
projects.description: Developed a system to enhance ATM security using facial recognition and OTP authentication, reducing fraud by ensuring transactions are authenticated by the account holders face and a one-time password. Utilized Python, OpenCV, dlib, and Twilio to implement this solution without requiring hardware changes.

experiences.description: Participants gain an understanding of basic machine learning concepts, including algorithms, data preprocessing, and model evaluation. Through hands-on exercises and projects, participants learn to apply machine learning algorithms, perform data preprocessing, and evaluate model performance.

Learned the basics of HTML and CSS and the fundamental concepts of JavaScript, Bootstrap and DBMS. Also covered important sub-topics such as responsive design, structuring web page elements, and web accessibility.

full_output.name: Kota Vivek
